code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant M as Main
    participant MM as MindMap
    participant LE as LLMExploration
    participant LS as LanguageSupport
    participant OD as OntologyDatabase
    M->>MM: render_map(Education_ContentCDN)
    M->>LE: explore(Education_StudentDB)
    LE-->>M: return exploration_data
    M->>LE: generate_summary(Education_GradeSync)
    LE-->>M: return summary
    M->>LE: generate_flashcards(Education_GradeSync)
    LE-->>M: return flashcards
    M->>LS: translate(Education_StudentDB)
    LS-->>M: return translated_text
    M->>LS: detect_language(Education_LMS_Portal)
    LS-->>M: return language
    M->>OD: save_ontology(Education_GradeSync)
    OD-->>M: None
    M->>OD: load_ontology(Education_StudentDB)
    OD-->>M: return concepts
